title: Condition evaluation for when clauses
description:
## Description
Implement condition evaluation for 'when' clauses that control step execution.

**Code Location:** packages/daemon/internal/workflow/condition.go (new file)

**Context from Proposal:**
```yaml
- name: fix-tests
  type: agent
  spell: fix-tests
  when: "{{.previous.failed}}"  # only runs if previous step failed

- name: apply-fixes
  type: agent
  spell: apply-review-fixes
  when: "{{.actionable.outputs.needs_fixes}}"  # runs based on step output
```

**Features:**
- Evaluate 'when' clause as boolean expression
- Access previous step status: {{.previous.failed}}, {{.previous.succeeded}}
- Access step outputs: {{.step_name.outputs.field}}
- Explicit boolean coercion (fail fast on type errors)
- Skip step if condition is false

**Boolean Coercion Rules:**
- "true"/"false" strings → boolean
- Non-empty string → true
- Empty string/null → false
- Numbers: 0 → false, non-zero → true
- Type errors fail loudly (don't silently convert)

## Testing Requirements
- Unit tests for {{.previous.failed}} evaluation
- Unit tests for {{.previous.succeeded}} evaluation
- Unit tests for step output access in conditions
- Unit tests for boolean coercion rules
- Unit tests for type error handling
- Unit tests for skipping steps when condition false
- E2E test of conditional step execution

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] 'when' clause evaluated before step execution
- [ ] Step skipped when condition is false

- [ ] Boolean coercion follows documented rules
- [ ] Type errors produce clear failures

title: Built-in implement-bead grimoire
description:
## Description
Create the default implement-bead grimoire that handles full implementation cycle.

**Code Location:** .coven/grimoires/implement-bead.yaml

**Context from Proposal:**
```yaml
name: implement-bead
description: "Full implementation cycle for one bead"

steps:
  - name: implement
    type: agent
    spell: implement
    input:
      bead: "{{.bead}}"

  - name: quality-loop
    type: loop
    max_iterations: 3
    on_max_iterations: block
    steps:
      - name: run-tests
        type: script
        command: "npm test"
        on_fail: continue

      - name: fix-tests
        type: agent
        spell: fix-tests
        when: "{{.previous.failed}}"
        input:
          test_output: "{{.run_tests.output}}"

      - name: review
        type: agent
        spell: review
        output: findings

      - name: check-actionable
        type: agent
        spell: is-actionable
        input:
          findings: "{{.findings.outputs.issues}}"
        output: actionable

      - name: apply-fixes
        type: agent
        spell: apply-review-fixes
        when: "{{.actionable.outputs.needs_fixes}}"
        input:
          issues: "{{.findings.outputs.issues}}"

      - name: final-test
        type: script
        command: "npm test"
        on_success: exit_loop

  - name: merge-changes
    type: merge
    require_review: true
```

**Features:**
- Implements bead using implement spell
- Quality loop iterates test → fix → review → fix
- Exits loop on passing tests
- Blocks bead after 3 failed iterations
- Merge step requires human review

## Testing Requirements
- Unit tests for grimoire schema validation
- Unit tests for variable reference validation
- E2E test of grimoire dry-run preview
- E2E test of full grimoire execution (integration)

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Grimoire parses without errors
- [ ] All spell references resolve
- [ ] All variable references valid
- [ ] Dry-run preview works
- [ ] Can be overridden by user grimoire

title: Variable and output passing between steps
description:
## Description
Implement the variable context system for passing data between workflow steps.

**Code Location:** packages/daemon/internal/workflow/context.go (new file)

**Context from Proposal:**
```yaml
- name: review
  type: agent
  spell: review
  output: findings  # names this step's output

- name: check-actionable
  type: agent
  spell: is-actionable
  input:
    findings: "{{.findings.outputs.issues}}"  # references previous output
  output: actionable

- name: apply-fixes
  type: agent
  spell: apply-review-fixes
  input:
    issues: "{{.findings.outputs.issues}}"  # can reference any prior step
```

**Features:**
- Accumulate step outputs in workflow context
- Name outputs with 'output' field for easy reference
- Resolve {{.step_name.output}} and {{.step_name.outputs.field}} paths
- Special variables: {{.bead}}, {{.previous}}, {{.loop.iteration}}
- Immutable - steps can't modify previous outputs

**Context Structure:**
```json
{
  "bead": { "id": "coven-xxx", "title": "...", ... },
  "implement": { "output": "...", "status": "success" },
  "findings": { "outputs": { "issues": [...] } },
  "previous": { "failed": false, "succeeded": true }
}
```

## Testing Requirements
- Unit tests for output naming and storage
- Unit tests for {{.step_name.output}} resolution
- Unit tests for {{.step_name.outputs.field}} deep access
- Unit tests for {{.bead}} variable access
- Unit tests for {{.previous}} special variable
- Unit tests for missing variable handling
- E2E test of multi-step workflow with data passing

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Step outputs stored in context by step name
- [ ] 'output' field names step output for easy reference
- [ ] Deep path access works (outputs.field.subfield)
- [ ] {{.bead}} provides full bead data
- [ ] {{.previous}} updates after each step
- [ ] Missing paths produce clear errors
- [ ] Context is immutable (steps can't overwrite)
